summary: The package supplies a collection of graph neural network model implementations covering various architectures (e.g., convolutional, attention, spectral, propagation) built with DGL and PyTorch, together with a command‑line interface that loads standard citation network datasets, constructs the selected model, runs training loops, and reports node classification performance.
business_intent: To provide a ready‑to‑use benchmark suite for experimenting with and comparing GNN models on citation‑network node classification tasks, enabling researchers and developers to quickly evaluate different architectures and hyper‑parameter settings.
